QuestData.Title: Talbuk Training: The Garn
QuestData.Description: The last test for your mount will pit it against one of the great terrors of this land.$B$BThe garn. Wolves as black as night, and twice the size of a normal wolf, they can tear an orc apart in mere moments. The beasts here wisely fear them.$B$BThere is a lone garn that calls Nagrand its home. Take your talbuk, mount up, and bring it down. If the two of you survive, your talbuk will truly be ready for war.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Maimclaw while riding your Talbuk-In-Training.
